passage.title: Nothing on the paper
passage.paragraph: An art teacher asks his students to draw a picture. They can draw anything they want.
After a while, a boy hands in his picture. The teacher looks at it but sees nothing on the paper.
"What do you draw?" the teacher asks.
"A cow eats grass." the boy answers.
"But where is the grass." the teacher asks again.
"The cow has eaten it up." answers the boy.
"When it eats up the grass, it goes back home to sleep."
